models.companies: A vendor, client, or service provider that the user does business with (includes profile info, logos, contact details).
models.accounts: A financial account belonging to a Company (checking, credit card, loan, etc.) with balance and account details.

relationships: Each Company can have one or more Accounts
Accounts are displayed on the company details page and link to account details

companies.name: Amazon Web Services
companies.notes: Cloud infrastructure provider. Charges vary monthly based on usage. Contact: billing@aws.com for invoice questions.

companies.notes: Mobile service for 3 business lines. Auto-pay enabled.
